Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::Hellbat/Treadshot/Hurricane/Godfather/Sharpedge/Jetstorm/Orion/Torca/Ratche

t/Sideswipe/Sky Lynx::: 

::Hellbat, Treadshot, Hurricane, and Godfather reach the CF and arm 
themselves for battle.  Sharpedge reaches the CF and lands, Jetstorm 
transforming to robot mode::
Sharpedge: Mafia, merge and form Mobster, take a shot at the CF while the 
sheilds are down.  Jetstorm, your with me, we'll try to pick off as many 
Maximals as possible, move out!
::Sharpedge and Jetstorm head closer to the CF.  Sharpedge fires 2 missles at 
Hot Rod and Jetstorm fires 25 energy blasts and 25 rapid fire optic blasts at 
him::
Hellbat: Batbreast, eject!
::Batbreast launches out and tries to suck Angel Prime's blood.  Treadshot 
fires 25 shots from Catgut at Angel Prime.  Hurricane fires 15 lightning 
bolts at Windlord.  Godfather fires 8 shots from his pistol at Teltoli.  My 
Maximals charge into battle except for Torca, who stays by Klant.  Orion 
fires 2 missles and Ratchet fires 8 shots from each of his two guns at 
Sixshot.  Sideswipe fires 25 shots from his rifle and 2 missles at Dark One, 
and Sky Lynx fires 2 missles from his two missle launchers at him(thats six 
missles and 25 bullets heading for Dark One)::
Torca: Klant, buddy, you ready to engage the enemy?

--part1_16.6156ca1.276979a2_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
